animeDescription: A music clip OVA using full versions of songs that were from the anime. While most of the OVA is re-purposed footage from the original show, this release does contain footage that never aired previously showing some events that occurred after the final episode.
animeRelated: ['Prequel: Chouon Senshi Borgman', 'Sequel: Chouon Senshi Borgman: Lovers Rain']
